vsParam:
Um, it's small, but it is a courtyard!
I think this is where Amaryllis meant.

And there are so many butterflies. I think this is it.
Alright, let's search for the "Meteor Butterflies"!

Hey, Anise—
Is this the "Meteor Butterfly"?
No, that's the "Chestnut Tiger", not the same kind...

Huh— You even know that? Good for you, Anise...
Ah, found it! Butterflies like stars!

... Alright, got you!
This one must be the "Meteor Butterfly"!?

...! Ah, exactly!
Wonderful, they're not completely extinct!

Please give us some of your scales... Sorry.
I should let it go now.

Wow, this is the "Scale of Stars"...
It does look like twinkling stars!

It's true... Hehe.
It's exactly like [px].

The way that you fight for your goal
with persistence makes you... glitter... That's all!
It kind of makes me a bit embarrassed...
I am exactly a glittering alchemist!

S-sorry that I said weird stuff...
But you... do make me feel you're glittering, [px]!

Hee hee... Hahaha!
Exactly, you're glittering, [px].
It kind of makes me a bit embarrassed...

S-sorry that I said weird stuff...
But you... do make me feel you're glittering, [px]!

Hee hee... Hahaha!
Exactly, you're glittering, [px].

So... please use the "Scale of Stars"
to make the "Pyroxene of Wisdom".
I'm so looking forward to it, [px]!
